titles: A lamentable new ballad vpon the Earle of Essex his death To the tune of, Essex last goodnight.
Lamentable new ballad upon the earle of Essex death.
notes: Verse - "All you that cry, O hone, O hone,".
Identified as Wing L273 on UMI microfilm set "Early English books, 1641-1700", reel 2123.
Reproductions of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Essex, Robert Devereux, --  Earl of, 1566-1601 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
